testcase.name: Validate common scenarios for addition via get call
Validate addition with two int values (happy path)
testcase.system-out:
* def operationURL = baseUrl + '/add' ..................................... passed * def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performAdd = function(op1,op2){return op1 + op2} .................... passed * call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaGet.feature') {opURL:'#(operationURL)'} . failed

* def operationURL = baseUrl + '/add' ..................................... passed * def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performAdd = function(op1,op2){return op1 + op2} .................... passed Given url operationURL .................................................... passed And param val1 = testDataInput[0].operand1 ................................ passed And param val2 = testDataInput[0].operand2 ................................ passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match $.result == performAdd(testDataInput[0].operand1,testDataInput[0].operand2) . passed
